official_title: A bill to amend the Housing Amendments of 1955, to extend certain financial assistance for construction of waterworks to private corporations.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, under the Housing Amendments of 1955, to extend financial assistance for construction of water works to private corporations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing Amendments of 1955, to extend certain financial assistance for construction of waterworks to private corporations.
